questions.title: General
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Has the TM notice been accepted by the council?
Is signing in accordance with NRSWA?

questions.title: Signs
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are all signs in the correct place?
Are all signs clean?
Have all damaged signs been removed and replaced?
Are all signs secured against being blown over?
Is there an information board displayed?

questions.title: Traffic Cones
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are all traffic cones in the correct place?
Are all traffic cones clean?
Are all traffic cones fitted with a Class 2 reflective sleeve?
Have all damaged cones been removed and replaced?

questions.title: Road Safety Lamps
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are there sufficient numbers of road safety lamps?
Are they working?
Are they clean?

questions.title: Traffic Lights
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are the traffic lights working correctly?
Is there a STOP/GO board available?
If the traffic lights are powered by diesel, is the tank full?

questions.title: Pedestrian Routes
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Are pedestrian routes clearly indicated?
Are pedestrian routes free from obstructions?
Does it meet the minimum unobstructed width of 1m?
If a temporary footway in the road is used, are ramps to the kerbs provided where necessary?

questions.title: Completion
questions.info: Here we add content from the IMS system or mandatory legislation or best practise info

questions.question: Have all signs, cones, barriers & lamps been removed?
Have any covered permanent signs been restored?
Have the authorities been told the work is completed?
